Hey Gordon, ya maniac. A good friend of mine has moved
near Machida. He trains at th eTen man gu dojo. He
wants to join a sword appreciation group. I told him
about you and he still wants to join. So, what is near
him? Aren't youonly a few stops away? Bob the slob
